section.title: Switch Processor
section.para: A Switch Processor switches pfield1 with pfield2 for all notes in SoundObject. It is useful in conjunction with RetrogradeProcessor when reversing notes that have start and end values in pfields, i.e.
section.programlisting: ;inum start dur start end i1 0 1 8.04 8.00 i1 1 2 8.00 8.07
;inum start dur start end i1 0 2 8.00 8.07 i1 2 1 8.04 8.00
section.para: with retrograde and switch on p4 and p5 becomes:
section.programlisting: ;inum start dur start end i1 0 2 8.07 8.00 i1 2 1 8.00 8.04
